title: How my rescue kitten rescued me from the anxiety blues
text:
On World Mental Health Day, we should consider the impact pets can have on wellbeing

I have always struggled with anxiety. Not the severe, clinical kind that requires medication to treat (although various doctors over the years have gently suggested that direction), but the more mundane variant that so many people who politely decline the “mental ill-health” label will be uncomfortably familiar with.

You know the anxiety I mean. It’s the cocktail of common negative emotions (stress, self-doubt, feelings of inadequacy, constant worry about things far beyond your control) that seem trivial on their own, until you realise you haven’t slept properly in months and you’re so depressed about everything...
description: On World Mental Health Day, we should consider the impact pets can have on wellbeing
